reviewText:
Shalom

I enjoyed the DVD. Yah is awakening the apple of his eye. We still have much work to do but this is a very great start. One downside of the DVD was I did not like the moderator using the word lord and god. We must only use the set apart name that Yah gave to Moshe to give to the children of Israel to give to the world HalleluYah (YHWH). There were many repeated pictures and the moderator talked a little fast. But the hebrew ahki that was breaking down the facts about the letter J oh my my my he has much knowledge and his ruach just from the TV was that he love Yah. Todah Yah! HalleluYah !

Shalom
KimmieYah

We Must Remain Humble Israel
I thought the DVD was very educational. Good Black History DVD. I would recommend that everyone see this DVD especially African Americans.

I first watched some of this on youtube and I must say it is interesting. Some of this stuff we learned in history it just wasn't emphasized or it was glossed over but it is good to see it all put together and backed up with evidence. I shared it with my children and other relatives I'd like to have my childrens school air it so I will meet with the PTA on this issue. Good info educate the people

Mark E. Copeland A.K.A YahYa Bandele has created an fantastic documentary of the so called blacks here in America. This video goes deep into depth about the falls of the so called negro, and explains in detail why is it that the so called negros are within the situations that they are in today.
All in all as we can see from the scriptures that there have been lies that have been told to the so called negro, for the generations that they have been held as captives here within the U.S.A. Lies that within this time period are starting to become uncovered and revealed, and this documentary brings even more light onto the truths of whom these people are and why it is that they do not even see whom it is, that they are as an people!
What an devestation! What an mystery! How frightening it is that all that these people have gone through has all been done by the one true ELOHIEM!
This DVD tells it all (And thoroughly I must add) and it is definitley an eye opener.
The truth can no longer be hidden.
Great Work MARK E. COPELAND A.K.A YAHYA BANDELE

I would really like to see this documentary shown on national tv. This DVD challenges your thinking as to God's people.  Although, I don't choose not to view God's people in terms of color, it offers a deep perspective to roots of kingdom family.

HALLELU YAH! YAHWEH IS AWAKING HIS PEOPLE THE SO CALLED NEGRO OR AFRICAN AMERICAN..... WE ARE THE TRUE HEBREW ISRAELITES... THE CHILDREN OF ISRAEL....I BROUGHT THIS DVD AND I MUST SAY, THAT IT IS LAID OUT WONDERFULLY.... IT IS FILLED WITH TRUTH!ANYONE WHO IS SEARCHING FOR THE TRUTH OF YAH AND HIS TRUE PEOPLE NEED TO BUY THEIR COPY. SPREAD THE WORD AROUND, GET THIS FOR FAMILY AND FRIENDS. IT IS SCRIPTUALLY BASED KNOWLEDGE STRAIGHT FROM THE SCRIPTURES THEMSELVES. IT OPENED MY EYES EVEN MORE... BECAUSE I HAVE ALWAYS HAD A FEELING DEEP IN MY HEART AND ON MY MIND THE WE THE NEGRO AND ANY OTHER BYWORD WE ARE KNOWN BY..... ARE THE CHILDREN OF ISRAEL....THE DECENDENTS OF THE HEBREW ISRAELITES... WE FIT EVERY LAST CURSE THAT IS WRITTEN IN SCRIPTURE.... OUR NEGRO SPRITIUALS TELL A STORY THAT NO OTHER PEOPLE HAVE EVER TOLD BEFORE...SONGS THAT WERE SUNG STRAIGHT FROM THE BOTTOM OF THE SLAVE SHIPS THAT CARRIED US OVER INTO THIS LAND KNOWN AS BABYLON....TODAH BROTHER FOR YOU TRULY ARE A MAN/SERVANT OF YAH!!!!!

Yahya Bandele has brought forth a great piece of work.  Those who don't have the ear to hear or the eyes to see won't hear nor will they see.

The truth of the matter is this: the so called black people of the west are direct descendants of the biblical Israelites.  There is more biblical, historical and archaeological evidence proving the african americans are Israelites then there is for any group of people including the Ashkenazi Jewish population.

 The information in this DVD is not racist, nor is it hate filled.  Yahya presents the truth and the truth is a hard pill to swallow for some.  Just read the review from the person in Hafia Israel.

Get this DVD, invite friends and family, church members over to watch, and learn all about this long, hidden ancient truth.

Peace

This is a most amazing dvd. You cannot deny the proof or the hidden history of the true hebrews. Yah willing, this dvd will open the small portion of the world who are meant to recieve this knowledge to gain further undertanding. If you are going to call this dvd blasphemous and mocking you will have to prove any of the information brought forth in this dvd(historical and biblical) false and incorrect by those standards. If you can't do that then you need to sit back and really think and pray to the Most High that He will deliver you from ignorance and the waiting lake of fire! I find it interesting that the very people who are imitating the true hebrews will call them blasphemous... If anything is humorous it is that comment. Surely the world has been DECIEVED! You do not have to believe any of the information brought forth in this dvd for it to be true... just give a few more years when our Beloved messiah returns in all His glory to redeem His father's chosen people. Deuteronomy 29:4... Yah chooses whom He will give the eyes to see and the ears to hear... Most will deny until the day of judgement which is ever so near.
Great reading
1 of the best DVDs I ever watched very informative ! He did the research! Beautiful!
love it
Great purchase

I thank our Heavenly Father for the truth! Because our people for many centuries since slavery have been deceived about who we are in this country. All we have ever known about who we are is; Slavery, and the Civil Rights, that's our
history in America. Every other race in this country have their true identity, language, culture, names, and religion. As l stated above, everything our Hebrew Ancestors had were stripped from them. In other word; LITERALLY beaten out of them all their history had been erased from their minds. Debut. 28:49, tells us: The Lord shall bring a nation against thee from far, from the end of the earth, as SWIFT as the EAGLE flieth; a nation whose tongue thou shalt not understand. Debut. 28:68 tells us; The Lord shall bring thee into EGYPT again with SHIPS.
The word Egypt means; SLAVERY, and from Africa to America by ships. African Americans are not Africans, but the HEBREW ISRAELITES. Yeshua who Americans called Jesus is "Black"
He was born in the tribe of Juda (Hebrew 7:14)
Rev. 1:14 tells us; His head and his were white like wool,, as white as snow, and his feet like unto fine brass, as if they burned in a furnace;
We are the true HEBREW ISRAELITES!!!!
FOR ALL AGES TO LOOK AT ALSO TO KEEP IN THE HOUSE THANKYOU ARON NEBEYOU
I have not seen it as of yet, but heard that this DVD was great.
Interesting book.

Great
Info
Excellent.

This book distort Black History, Egypt was called the Land of Ham, Ham was the father of the Black race not Shem.  Now when Joseph summoned the Hebrews to Egypt his eleven brothers brought  2 pure Hebrew females, Dinah the daughter of Jacob/Israel and Serah Asher's grand daughter along with 56 Hebrew bachelors that married Hamite/Egyptian women thus the ancient Hebrews were black skinned due to this infusion of Ham's bloodline of black women, but children take their lineage from their father's not their mothers, hence you see in the New Testament that Shem was a forefather of Jesus Christ though every woman listed in Jesus' lineage was black such as Rachab the Canaanite Harlot in the land of Canaan in Jericho and Tamar the pretend Canaanite Shrine prostitute and Ruth the half black half Hebrew fore bearers of Jesus.  Read the Complete Works of Blacks in the Bible and reject rejecting your own noble heritage from the land of Ham.  Ham's sons names were hidden in Hebrew by the racist translators of the Renaissance era but the lands named after them appear in English.  Ham's firstborn son was written in Hebrew as Cush but the land called by the very same word was written in English as Ethiopia Noah's grandson.  Ham's second born's name was written in Hebrew as Mizraim but the land is called by the English form of his name Egypt Noah's other grand son.  Ham's third son's name they wrote in Hebrew as Phut but the land called by his name they wrote in English as Libya.  The only son these racist translators kept his name and the land named after him the same is Canaan because he was cursed by Noah and his is the only name you recognize.  Get The Complete Works of Blacks in the Bible and avoid this book which despises Black heritage and deceives the simple who do not study "the Scriptures of Truth".  Whites are in search of scraps of Noah's Ark  when the only person off of the Ark that left a legacy was the father of the Black Race Ham for ancient Egypt is called "the land of Ham" in Psalms 105:23 and Psalms 106:22.
Video was badly taped picture freezing  not worth the money I paid.  Good information in parts
A little pricey but it's definitely edifying! Better to watch this than a lot of the filth in the theaters!! Keep up the good work ahk!
Highly informative.
No longer confused and happy to be "black". To know that my peoples struggle was for a reason. This DVD sheda light with biblical background. Amen and praise be to Yahweh.
A Spirit of Renewal. Includes Bishop Desmond Tutu's words, take notes. Profound insights.
enjoyed documentary

This has become one of My Most Used Study Guide References.  It holds ALL the SCRIPTURES in Our History Book (Hebrew Israelites...I'm referring to the Holy Bible), that has helped Me IMMENSELY.  Get it, and You will SEE for Yourself, what I am RAVING ABOUT!!!  Per Paul's decree in II Timothy 2:15, breaks it down what is REQUIRED of the Children of Israel.  ALL African Americans are Hebrew Israelites!!!  it is IMPERATIVE that those of You who, as Christ spoke to the Churches...Revelation 2:7, can HEAR and UNDERSTAND, DO YOUR DUE DILIGENCE, and get Yourselves back to Your "Natural State!!!"  Here is a STRONG GUIDE!!!
Educational and eye opening information.
Extremely informative and truthful.
I like the subject matter but did not care for the way the video was produced.
This book will help answer so many questions that many of us have had for years but were afraid to ask or did not whom to ask.
Tells about african american and african people experiences plain and upfront
Every Black person should watch this and let your kids see what they don't teach our KIDS!
Cool movie with lots of great info.
Good basic info contained in this DVD. Strictly for those searching for their identity.
Very informative any one of color(Black, African-American) should be reqired to view this. Matter Fact it should be viewed in school before the story Anne frank this is "OUR HISTORY"!

I rate 3 because I am not an Islamic Muslim. However it is fact that the Africans sold hebrews into slavery.

During the 66-70A.D. ; Hebrew Israelite vs. Roman war. Israelites fled into Africa.
Like other countries Africa practiced slavery. Slavery consisted of war captives, and criminals.

Previous to the Trans-Atlantic slave trade slaves of Africa could own land, have children born free, marry free people, have slaves of there own, and could eventually be set free.

The selling of the Hebrews was financially prosperous. And an economical system. Africans decided to purge there land of Hebrews from among them, they looked like them, they had integrated with them over the years: BUT THEY WERE A DIFFERENT PEOPLE. Hence Africans did not sell there on people into slavery!

Another fact that the world does not want you to know is that Christopher Columbus was a black man and so were his voyagers. That the black african Egyptians were the first people known to establish a civilization.

Do your reasearch and stop believing what is taught to you. It's meant to keep you lost and oppressed. The truth will set you free. If you disagree look it up!!!!!
alot fo information here in terms of biblical prophecey.good.
Very informative. Something to share with friends and family.
There was so much that I learned about who my people realy are and how we where robbed of our true history from biblicle times to the present day.

So im in to my history. Not just of my own race but just good real history of all kinds because I injoy learning. This movie is the truth.not only the truth but five star and  some truth!!!!!!!! LOOK ITS THE TRUTH YES!
Kept me engaged very informational. Made me want to keep digging for more information in regards of this subject. Check it out.
Good back ground history of African Americans in the bible. I got a lot out of it and learned !
For a long time since I was a little girl I knew something wasn't right but I couldn't put my finger on it.  This is that it and now I can put my finger on it!!

It was ok but does not give proof to what it was proclaiming
Jesus is Lord and I am a Christian

I received this DVD in a timely manner, only two days after ordering, and I was very impressed with the information and content of the history explained. I will be sharing this DVD with my family and encourage them to buy a copy as well... I am very satisfied.
This film provides detailed information (Biblical/historical facts) about the true Jews. I would highly recommend this to everyone. This is also good for further research.
This book is for everyone and is a good tool for racial harmony!!!It should be allowed in the schools as history lesson..
Because we are not Hebrews we are Moorish American's descendent of The ancient Moabite and the true sovereigns of this land known as America

The Hebrew or the So-Called Negro? by Yahya Bandele links African slavery to the judgements  spoken of in Deutoronomy 28 of the Bible hence demonstrating that the African slaves were Jews. This to me makes perfect sense. However, what I was hoping to get from this film was a better understanding of was the connection that these African slaves had to Judaism -i.e. the tribes they came from, were they known to be Hebrew tribes, thus were picked to be put on slave ships. This is what I wanted to find out and it was not answered here. So this is why I am giving it a three star.  The filming needs some tweaking but overall for someone who has never heard about the Hebrew roots of Africans in North,South,Central  Americas and the Caribbean, this is a good film to start with.

If there's is one thing most Black Americans can't argue with, in my humble opinion, is that there is something ....peculiarly very far reaching, wide ranging in scope & pervasive about our place in America & the world!  Once when I did ponder the whole situation one word came to my mind that seemed to say it ALL!  The word: "SUPERNATURAL!!!"  At the time I wasn't even thinking in terms of the Almighty I just thought in terms of a man or even men, human mortal mankind is NOT capable of pulling off even "hatred" to the grand scale that Blacks experience it here & around the globe.  We may very well be the most disunited race on Earth but ONE thing that I believe unites us is our SHARED experience of ALL forms of prejudice or racism!  Somehow once we start talking to each other no matter where our place is on the social scale we can ALL, each & every last one of us of age to KNOW , relate to one another's stories of racial motivated prejudices inflicted by non-Black persons!  We all KNOW something is VERY WRONG we just never knew why, how, where, when!  It was only recently that The Most High revealed to me personally ALL of the who's, why's, where's, when's & how's! It just all jelled.  NO MAN can answer this for a Black person because most of them don't know they just DO what the call is to do!  BUT the wonderful thing is that THIS is the VERY thing that makes one KNOW it is ONLY by the power of Yah!  HE knows that ONCE HE reveals this to Israel he will KNOW that Yah is Supreme!  This DVD helps get us there!

This video attempts to educate us on the separation of the tribes of Israel which are sometimes referred to as the Lost Tribes of Israel. It inspires me to do additional research and that's always a good thing!!!

Oh my goodness when I got this dvd I was blown away and could not believe how we had been lied to the entire world. Wow now everything makes so much more sense why these people have suffered for centuries. Wow and this guy has other very interesting videos like garden and the cave, children of the fallen something like that. They are not  for people that will not take the time to compare with bible scriptures and accept truth for what it is. I highly recommend this dvd and the others also!

The documentary was very enlightening. I knew that there was something more concerning Black Hebrews. This gave me a frame of reference to begin further study. One con is the picture quality, but the information more than made up for it. (And YahWeh is his name).

This documentary is to me better than another popular black documentary that I won't name...this one for me had more insight & evidence of the betrayal of a people who are truly lost and it explains why this group of people are in the situation they are in. I suggest that you let kids watch this as well as family. Everyone deserves to know their history....please educate your kids, your church, college students with this DVD.

I'm a true believer. I liked the info, but questioned other folks who weren't Christian who decided to tell the truth which brings to mind how those who use to be Christian left the faith for something else to defend their part in history.
Once again, this is another DVD that is history that will never be taught in a public history class and is very important for African Americans.

This is a video made by a Hebrew Israelite who has like most other Hebrew Israelites uses and takes scriptures out of context to promote a Black Israelite Supremacist Ideology. This movie is used to promote the Deut 28 Blsck people fit the curses so therefore they must be the "true Israelites" and none other than who is listed in their fake 12 tribes breakdown of North American nations can be true Israelites, It's a shame, this all is due to a lack of reading comprehension skills and a bad King James Version that has been taught to these naive individuals. It'really sad how decieved these people are, so desperate for an identity and an excuse for the failures of black Americans outside of the systemic opression of black people. (meaning the failures we had the ability to control) They put this historian, with an african accent on the screen and we are supposed to believe him becasue he is old, has a suit on and an african accent. I saw to name institution he teaches at, so am I supposed to just take his word for it? Who was this guy really and what qualifies his intpretation of scripture over what is clearly stated. Smoke and mirrors. He states that the Egypt in deut 28:68 was America, not so, it was talking about literal Egypt/Mizraim. Jews did go into captivity in ships to the slave port Alexandria, we must trace the true history this is a vast dostortion of true Israels history. Sad we don't have our scholarly game where it needs to be.

My People watch this and wake up........don't walk around in daze as we have an amazing history which was stolen from us beause we turned away and worshipped other gods but the time is here for us to come back together as a Nation (ISREAL)
The "hoax" is this video. It is complete rubbish. It is based on pure fantasy and pseudo history. Absolutely appalling.

this dvd changed my whole life without exaggeration! all african americans NEED the info contained on this dvd. i do realize that only those who are being awakened will grasp the info and order their lives accordingly and  this is a good source to start from when trying to help and teach others especially those of a sincere christian faith. my husband and i will be purchasing more dvd's to hand out in an information packet as well as to gift idividually to family and friends. i have since gone on from this dvd to further my knowledge and understanding of the truths presented in this dvd and i strongly urge all to do that.. get the dvd but go on to prove for yourself that it is indeed true... buy this dvd and visit the c . o. f. a. h  network. shalome and blessings to all my brothers and sisters!!

I really liked the parts where scripture was included in this DVD, this is a must have for people who like history, or may be curious about
Other thoughts and understandings!!!!

Received the package ontime... I wish I had seen it sooner It answered some questions for me as far as religion for the slaves before they were slaves.

This is why we cannot find our ancestors they don't want us to... A MUST SEE!

I thoroughly enjoyed this DVD, and it is very important information that is overlooked by the westernized churches. This is subject matter no one wants to truthfully discussed, and so much of our history has been concealed and distorted, is it any wonder some people will find this DVD shocking and hard to believe ? However, scripture substantiates each and every claim in the DVD, and when you think of the characteristics of a people mentioned in the Old Testament scriptures, the So-called Negro in America fits the essence of these scriptures like hand to glove. Remarkable DVD !
Knowing yourself, who you really are, and not being define by someone else is priceless. Truth is paramount. Praise YAH !
The quality of the DVD looks like someone made a "home copy." I was turned off by the lack of quality of the recording. It's an embarrassment.

I expected a product that would provide historical facts based on tangible evidence with clean production. However, much of what was given within this body of work was testimony on what persons claimed they knew or just statements without tangible confirmation. Also, the production of the video was annoying (background, white noise, etc).

I appreciate the effort, however, to be taken seriously, more research and production needs to put forth prior to the next release. I will still support the endeavor. Also, this DVD is more of a threshold of information rather than an actual source. It will leave you wanting to research for yourself. In this aspect the DVD serves "a" purpose rather than the purpose of enlightenment.

Man, Know Thy Self.

I needed my Bible to follow along with the scriptures quoted.  I have learned many things I never knew and a member of my
study group had me order one for him,

Good information and tool for those that are awakening. Good quality video and scene selection options. However, it is a bitt too long and rather repetitive half way through.  Do not watch it before going to bed as you will fall asleep towards the end.  Otherwise, its very informative, scripturally based and the TRUTH.  Just needs a little tweeking with editing.  Shalom

This movie makes sense. This movie makes you think. I really enjoyed it. Some things I have heard about in the past or even thought of with uncertainty, but this movie sort of connected those dots. The only thing that got me, it was kind of funny actually, is that the information and the narrator's voice do not match. a morgan freeman voice would have gotten this movie 5 stars....but the info is DEEP!

Let the truth be told...Eye opener for many!!!! This film confirmed, as well as, enlightened me with various facts regarding our history. We must read and research...read and research!!! Information regarding our culture, history, and ancestry are important for us to understand our future!!!

Loved this DVD.

A lot of what was said confirmed what Rastas told me a long time ago.

We should teach our children African languages and culture.

As God will restore us. Very soon.
I bought this DVD and it didn't even work in my DVD player or my computer. I wish I could get my money back! This was a DAMN WASTE!!! I'm pissed off!
Just keep reading. May seem boring at first but it does get more and more interesting. I am finishing the first read and will be reading again.

THe editors's explanation of how European gentiles stole the Hebrew heritage of African Americans through slavery is far-reaching to say the least. The African slave trade was started by Africans in Africa along with muslim Arabs operating in Africa. Europeans arrived on the scene late and tapped in to an already existing slave trade. They arrived on the West coast of Africa (and did not go in to the interior of Africa), and traded with the African and Arab slave-traders for African slaves. The overwhelming majority of today's African-Americans are descended from Africans from West Africa (which is nowhere near East Africa or the Levant area of present day Israel). The religion of the Africans at the time of the European slave-trade era was overwhelmingly muslim or animist - not Jewish (or Christian either for that matter). This film appears to be just another distortion brought about by Afro-centric interests who wish to bash non-Jewish white males (they refer to them as European gentiles) in a typical display of a politically correct slanting and distortion of history.

I had studied the Word of God for several years and was a dedicated church goer, but an incident occured when my husband died in 1981 that completely turned me away from attending any church anymore, but not away from God.
I still continue my own personal walk with the Lord and trust in Him to direct my path.
It seemed to me that God opened my eyes and as a result of this awareness, I believed that I was not being told the whole truth.

I believe that all of those that are responsible should admit their wrondoings and  publicly ask for our forgiveness before the Lord returns.

This video verified many things that I had come to believe was true about Black people in general and Black people in America specifically. Black people are the TRUE HEBREW ISRAELITES. We are not as has been depicted through Hollywood or anywhere else.  Yahya Bandele has gotten to the heart of the matter, the Savior's real name is Yahoshua and the Father's real name is YAHWEH and we, the so-called black race are the Hebrew Israelites of the Scriptures.

How could it be anything else ?

In the spring of '09 , I came across a video on youtube , a man was explaining how the name Jesus came to be , how the letter " J " was created , and the true name of the messiah Yahoshua.

Then that same man gave the true meaning of the name.....Yahoshua .

That man was Dr. John Berkley.

Well , that did it for me , especially after I saw the sincerity Dr. Berkley was displaying.  I knew he believed what he was saying to be true. So , I found out the title of the real video , looked it up , purchased it , and not a week has gone by since that I haven't watched or listened to this video at least once

I have 70% of it memorized .

Why ?  The scriptures.  It's the scriptures that validate this powerful video .  It's the scriptures that puts the black people's concerns about our non-ending brainwashing in this country in it's proper perspective.  And it's the scriptures that will push the non-Bible-believers who happen to black......into their seats of denial.

I say that because even though the Bible has been tampered with , those who did the tampering could not keep the truth from appearing , and delivering , regardless .

Besides , if the scriptures weren't valid , why would Hollywood go and paint these powerful truths....... white ?

I am currently teaching my daughter this video......and I must say that we owe this video to our children.

Brotha Yahyah , thank you.....and bless you.

POINTMAN

This is a very thought provoking piece of information. I have always sought answers to questions no pastor could answer. I have been seeking more information and history since I saw this and have found that that being white is a birth defect. We were and are called every name under the sun and this is just another tool to keep us separated from the truth of who we really are. What this does is say to us that our pastors are not teaching us correctly. The real truth here is that we are spiritually connected to God and no amount of trickery can keep us from him. Please do understand the true message of this video is that it is the fault of our ancestors for our enslavement and the only way to get back to where we were is to humble ourselves and be true to our faith. We need to prove that Christianity is a true faith of our Messiah and if it is not then we need to get back to the basics of our true faith. This video is very well produced with bible references throughout that prove who we are. A must see!!!

This is a must see DVD. For those of us whose ancestors were stolen and shipped to America and other countries via slave ships, this DVD helped me to understand that the bible is the only form of history that many of us have to follow. I never realized that the bible was speaking about my ancestors until watching this DVD. Sadly, I and many of my family members have gone through life trying to accept the culture of others because we did not know our own. This DVD sheds light on why things have always been a struggle for us.  I used to think that God hated us, but now I see that He loves us so much. This DVD opened my eyes to see that the Old Testament is nothing but a continuous love story between Yahweh and his people.  He was always faithful and in love with us, but we were rebellious and disobedient towards Him. It really did get us into big trouble, and now Yahweh is the only one who can and will deliver us as we turn wholeheartedly back to Him. HalleluYAH!

This is truly the best documentary I've seen in my life thus far! As a child I've always felt that something was missing/wasn't right about the information/education I was receiving in this world today. This documentary unveils the true rich origins of the "so-called negro" and shows the evil nature of today's "so-called jewISH" people who biblical names are Esau/"white" man and Amalek/"so-called jew"/Esau's nephew. Esau and Amalek are Satan's children/Edomites from the nation of Edom/Mt. Seir and they are not Hebrew Yisraelites but are IMPOSTURES = (rev 2:9,3:9,12:9)(baruch 4:30-35)(Book of Jasher 82:52-62)(1maccabees 3:45-48)(2maccabees 6:6-9)(john 8:44)(job 9:24)(isa 44:5)(jere 8:8,16:3-4,38:19,49:16-18)(deut 16:18)(isa 4:16,14:12-17,14:12-14)(matt 24:11-12)(job 1:68,9:24,30:5-8,29)(gen 25:21-25,27:39-40,36:1-43)(eze 22:26-27)(habak 2:5)(gen 25:25)(heb 12:16-17)(rom 9:11-13)(mala 1:1-4)(obadiah 1-21)(dan 7:25)(prov 15:25)(psa 96:4-5)(rev 2:13-16,12:13). The true Jews/Hebrew Yisraelite people were and are "Black" not the white/LEPROSY/cursed, unclean, pale complexion we know in today's society and in media/movies = (jer 8:21,14:2)(job 9:24,30:30)(john 7:42)(num 12:10-12)(lev 13:30)(lam 4:8,5:10)(mica 5:2)(gen 49:29-30,29:32-35)(exo 4:6-7)(eze 40:3)(rev 1:13-15)(psa 2:1-3,78:51,83:1-12)(matt 2:13)(amos 9:7)(acts 13:1)(num 12:1)(hebr 7:14)(gen 10:6-20,50:7-11)(dan 7:9,10:5-6)(song of sol 1:5-6,5:2-11)(1Maccabees 3:45-48). The 12 Tribes of Yisrael/Hebrew Yisraelites are born by God our Father from the seed of Abraham through the womb and NOBODY can convert = (gen 16:18,17:7-10,18:16,19,21)(rom 9:6-13)(isa 46:3)(heb 2:16)(psa 147:19-20)(deut 18:18)(rev 22:16)(john 7:42)(2cor 11:22)(rom 11:1). People, the twelve tribes were and are scattered throughout the world and here are some of the lands where the dwell today: Judah = Negros/America Blacks = (gen 49: 8-12)(deut 28:37, 48-68, 68, 33:7)(joel 3:1,3-8)(jere 14:2)(luk 21: 20-22)(zac 12:7)(jam 1:1). Benjamin = West Indians, Jamaica, Trinidad = (gen 49:27)(deut 33:12). Levi = Hati = (gen 49:5-7)(deut 33: 8-11)(mala 2:1,3,8,9). Simeon = Dominican Rep = gen 49:5-7)(deut 33: 8-11). Zebulon = Guatemala to Panama (Mayans) = gen 49:13)(deut 33:18-19). Ephraim/Joseph = Puerto Rico = (gen 49:22-26)(hosea 4:17-19, 7:8,11)(deut 33:13-17). The first time I saw this video, I was shocked and couldn't really grasp what I was seeing and hearing. There is still a part of me that does not want to believe that the so called Negroes here in American are direct descendants of the Hebrew Israelites. I want to be so careful as not to dismiss this as "erroneous doctrine" of some sort, but after looking at the biblical scriptures to prove who we really are, I can't help but to see this as the absolute truth. I always felt that the Israelites were just a separate group of people who were most likely not black. I just wish that all blacks here in America would sit down and watch this dvd and we could all have a discussion on it. Sometimes I wonder what the outcome would be, how much would we change our ways when we realize the truth about who we really are? I have yet to fully understand and accept that I may be a direct descendant of the Hebrew Israelites. There has been so much damage done to the black race especially mentally, that it may be almost impossible that we could come full circle to the truth of who we really are. All I can do is pray for the revelation for myself and others and hope that it will bring change.

Don't believe the hype of this book! Let the blood reign and let the DNA tell the story. The truth is, "According to a 2003 study, about 52% of Ashkenazi men with a tradition of Levite descent belong to the R1a haplogroup. That haplogroup is relatively rare among Ashkenazim without a tradition of Levite descent and still more uncommon among Sephardim (both Levites and non-Levites). Men belonging to this R1a cluster of Ashkenazi men have become known as R1a1a Ashkenazi Levites or, more recently, as R1a-CTS6 (CTS6 is a single-nucleotide polymorphism ("SNP") that is currently believed to be shared by all R1a1a Ashkenazi Levites.) (sitesdotgoogledotcom/site/levitedna/home)". "The sons of Aaron were Eleazar, Ithamar, and Nadab and Abihu. A descendant of Aaron is an Aaronite, or Kohen, meaning Priest. Any non-Aaronic Levitei.e., descended from Levi but not from Aaronassisted the Levitical priests of the family of Aaron in the care of the tabernacle; later of the temple (endotwikipediadotorg/wiki/Aaron)". This talk about dark and light skin is all BS to twist the truth. "7,000-Year-Old Human Bones Suggest New Date for Light-Skin Gene" (livesciencedotcom/42838-european-hunter-gatherer-genome-sequenceddoth-t-m-l).
